actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the requirement that certain food or beverage establishments allocate a portion of its gross receipts to its employees as tips and report such allocation to the Internal Revenue Service.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the Internal Revenue Code relating to the reporting by employers of tips in the case of certain food and beverage establishments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the requirement that certain food or beverage establishments allocate a portion of its gross receipts to its employees as tips and report such allocation to the Internal Revenue Service.
